typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> MovieparDS
source(output(
		userId as string,
		movieId as string,
		rating as string,
		timestamp as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ratingparDS
MovieparDS select(mapColumn(
		movieId,
		title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Dropgenre
ratingparDS select(mapColumn(
		userId,
		movieId,
		rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropTimeStamp
DropTimeStamp filter(rating >= '1.0') ~> ratingGTE1
Dropgenre, ratingGTE1 join(Dropgenre@movieId == DropTimeStamp@movieId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMovieRating
JoinMovieRating sort(desc(rating, true)) ~> SortbyRating
SortbyRating select(mapColumn(
		movieId = Dropgenre@movieId,
		title,
		userId,
		rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExcludMovid
